DashboardPage.title: Dashboard

OverviewCards.newSaleDescription: Create and print a new receipt for a transaction.

InventoryPage.title: Inventory
InventoryPage.description: Manage your products and stock levels.

AddProductDialog.title: Add New Product
AddProductDialog.description: Enter the details for the new product to add it to the inventory.
AddProductDialog.productAddedDescription: {productName} has been successfully added to your inventory.

ProductDetailsSheet.title: {productName}
ProductDetailsSheet.stockHistorySoon: Stock movement history feature coming soon.

CustomersPage.title: Customers
CustomersPage.description: Manage your wholesale and retail clients.

AddCustomerDialog.title: Add New Customer
AddCustomerDialog.description: Enter the details for the new customer to add them to your client list.
AddCustomerDialog.customerAddedDescription: {customerName} has been successfully added to your client list.

DeleteCustomerAlert.warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the customer {customerName} and remove all associated data.

ReceiptsPage.title: Sales Receipts
ReceiptsPage.description: Review and manage all past sales receipts.

GenerateReceiptDialog.title: Generate New Receipt
GenerateReceiptDialog.description: Select a customer and add products to create a new sales receipt.
GenerateReceiptDialog.missingInfoDescription: Please select a customer and fill all product lines.
GenerateReceiptDialog.confirmSaleDescription: You are about to generate a receipt for {customerName} with a total of {total} DA. This will deduct the items from stock and update customer history. This action cannot be undone.
GenerateReceiptDialog.receiptGeneratedDescription: Sale of {total} DA to {customerName} recorded. Stock updated.

ReportsPage.currentStockDescription: Top 10 products with the highest stock levels.
ReportsPage.categoryDistDescription: Distribution of products across different categories.
ReportsPage.topCustomersDescription: Top 10 customers with the highest total spending.
ReportsPage.customerTypeDistDescription: Breakdown of wholesale vs. retail customers.

StockAlertsPage.finalRestockListDescription: Add or remove items to create your final printable restock list.
